body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Johnson Cleaning Services. My name is Nathan Johnson. May I know your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Nathan, my name is Kelly Griffin.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Kelly. Could you provide me with your email address and phone number for our records, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is kelly.griffin@example.com and my phone number is five five five - four four four - three three three three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Kelly. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I received a bill from your company, but I'm a bit confused about the charges. Could you help me understand them better?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'd be happy to assist you with that, Kelly. Could you let me know which invoice number you are referring to?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's for the service provided on the twelfth of May. I believe the invoice number is one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Kelly. Let me check our records for that invoice and help clarify the charges for you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Kelly. If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
